attributes.action: allow a "petition against" option on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the FAQ to the site, it states that after discussion a petition against option should not be considered.  However, with so many ridiculous petitions on the site, it would be more representative to allow a "petition against" option.  If this site 'takes off' as I'm sure it will do, it will provide a powerful, if slightly skewed, gauge of public opinion.

It'd also be nice to be able to save your details, rather than having to type them in every time, but thats another issue!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
